content: I've been keeping an eye out for deals on HP laptops since mid-November, and I'm glad you mentioned these upcoming sales events. I was actually thinking of buying a new laptop to replace my old one, and I'm hoping to get a good deal. Speaking of good deals, I got a great discount on a 4K TV from Best Buy during the Black Friday sales at the local mall on November 27th - 40% off the original price!
